shipping_restrictions: We ship to all 50 US states
PO Boxes accepted for standard shipping only
Some items cannot be shipped to Alaska or Hawaii

order_tracking.how_to_track: Use tracking number provided in shipping confirmation email on our website or carrier website
tracking_updates: Order Received - We've received your order
Shipped - Package is on its way
Out for Delivery - Package is with local carrier

tracking_issues.no_tracking_update: Tracking may take 24-48 hours to update after shipment
tracking_issues.stuck_in_transit: Contact carrier first, then our support if issue persists
tracking_issues.delivered_but_not_received: Check with neighbors, building manager. Report within 48 hours for investigation

address_modification.before_shipment: Can be changed free of charge. Contact support immediately.
address_modification.after_shipment: Contact carrier directly. May incur additional fees.
address_modification.not_possible: Cannot change once out for delivery

delivery_scheduling.reschedule: Available for expedited and express shipments
delivery_scheduling.hold_at_location: Free service offered by most carriers

signature_requirements.alternative: Can authorize carrier to leave without signature (liability waiver)
signature_requirements.missed_delivery: Carrier will attempt redelivery next business day or hold at facility

standard_returns.condition: Unopened, original packaging, all accessories included

exceptions: Earbuds - Final sale if opened due to hygiene

steps: 1. Log in to your account and go to Orders
2. Select the item you want to return
5. Pack item securely in original box
6. Drop off at any carrier location
7. Refund processed within 5-7 days of receiving return
return_process.return_shipping: Free for defective or wrong items. $6.99 for buyer's remorse returns.

same_product_exchange.process: We'll send replacement immediately upon receiving return

different_product_exchange.process: Return original item and place new order

refund_timeline.refund_processing: 5-7 business days to original payment method
refund_timeline.credit_card: May take 1-2 billing cycles to appear on statement

partial_refunds.amount: Prorated based on condition (50-85% of purchase price)

store_credit_option.bonus: Get 10% extra value as store credit instead of refund
store_credit_option.usage: Can be used on any future purchase

before_shipment.process: Contact support or cancel from your account
before_shipment.cutoff: Must cancel within 2 hours of order placement

after_shipment.process: Cannot cancel, must return after delivery

process: 1. Take photos of damage and packaging
2. Contact support with order number and photos
3. Support will arrange pickup or provide return label
5. No need to wait for return to receive replacement
damaged_or_wrong_item.exceptions: For high-value items ($1000+), return may be required first

international_shipping.alternative: We recommend using a package forwarding service
international_shipping.note: Warranty may not be valid outside USA

bulk_orders.definition: Orders of 10+ units of same product
benefits: Net payment terms available for businesses

holiday_shipping.extended_returns: Items purchased Nov 1 - Dec 31 can be returned until January 31
holiday_shipping.delays_expected: Allow extra 2-3 days during peak holiday season
